com.cyc.km.modeling.task

Class CycBasedTask

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cyc.km.modeling.task.CycBasedTask

  • public class CycBasedTask
extends Object
    A class to represent tasks that involve interaction with Cyc.

      • CYC_BASED_TASK_REQUIREMENTS

        public static final CycSessionRequirementList<OpenCycUnsupportedFeatureException> CYC_BASED_TASK_REQUIREMENTS

    • Constructor Detail

      • CycBasedTask

        public CycBasedTask(KBIndividual taskTerm)
             throws OpenCycUnsupportedFeatureException
        Constructs a new task, backed by the specified term. Note that this does not create a new task in the KB, but just creates a new CycBasedTask object based on an existing KBIndividual in the Knowledge Base.
        Parameters:
        taskTerm - the KBIndividual representing this task.
        Throws:
        OpenCycUnsupportedFeatureException - when run against an OpenCyc server.

        Overrides:

      • getDescription

        public String getDescription()
                      throws KBApiException
        Returns a text description of the task. This description, derived from the KBIndividual underlying the task, is typically about one sentence, but may be arbitrarily long.
        Returns:
        the description, or null if there is no description available from Cyc.
        Throws:
        KBApiException

      • getSummary

                  throws KBTypeException,

        the summary
        Throws:
        Exception

      • getCandidateReplacements

        public List<Object> getCandidateReplacements(Sentence querySentence,
                                    ArgPosition argPosition)
                                      throws RuntimeException,
                                             OpenCycUnsupportedFeatureException
        Returns a list of task-relevant candidate replacement terms.
        Parameters:
        querySentence - - The sentence in which the focal term appears.
        argPosition - - The arg position of the focal term in the sentence.
        Returns:
        List of candidate replacement terms.
        Throws:
        RuntimeException - if there is some other kind of problem
        CycConnectionException
        OpenCycUnsupportedFeatureException
